description: Please check this if this is a self-bill Invoice
label: Self Bill Invoice
name: Purchase Invoice-custom_self_bill_invoice

depends_on: eval: ['Journal Entry', 'Bank Entry', 'Cash Entry', 'Debit Note', 'Credit Note'].includes(doc.voucher_type)
label: Accounting Type
name: Journal Entry-custom_accounting_type

depends_on: eval: doc.accounting_type == 'Accounts Payable' && ['Journal Entry', 'Bank Entry', 'Cash Entry', 'Debit Note', 'Credit Note'].includes(doc.voucher_type)
label: Supplier
name: Journal Entry-custom_supplier

depends_on: eval:doc.accounting_type === 'Accounts Receivable' && ['Journal Entry', 'Bank Entry', 'Cash Entry', 'Debit Note', 'Credit Note'].includes(doc.voucher_type)
label: Customer
name: Journal Entry-custom_customer
